t: What is a Childhood Beyond Brands? - Fairplay
s: June 23, 2021 - Despite what Amazon may say, being read a bedtime story by Alexa is just not the same. (And neither are things like online pre-school, virtual charter schools, or hanging out with friends in a Fortnite game instead of IRL.) – Play is driven by branded storylines and media.

t: Brand Child: Remarkable Insights into the Minds of Today's Global Kids & Their Relationships with Brands: Martin Lindstrom, Patricia B. Seybold: 9780749442842: Amazon.com: Books
s: Based on the world's most extensive study of tween attitudes and behaviours, and now available in paperback, BRANDchild is the first book to look in-depth at the phenomena behind global kids and their relationships with brands.

CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using VESLA HOME Brand Kitchen Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov
s: WASHINGTON, D.C. – The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is warning consumers to immediately stop using VESLA HOME brand kitchen faucets sold on Amazon.com. The faucets were tested and found to contain lead that can leach into water at levels that can be particularly harmful ...
